job_history.work_description: Promoted from Account Clerk to Accountant. Performs General Ledger reconciliation. Trains new employees on accounting principles and company procedures. Creates periodic reports comparing budgeted costs to actual costs. Weekly draw down cash from the State of Missouri utilizing the Financial Reporting System. Facilitates Accounts Receivable, including billing and collections. Processes Accounts Payable using Sage software. Manages many budgets for several grants, awards and contracts. Documents fiscal procedures and revises SLATE's fiscal manual as needed. Forecasting for several programs and departments as requested.

Managed office supplies, vendors, organization and upkeep. Cash management for various projects. Managed school picture program. Managed parking tag program. Directed guests and routed deliveries and courier services. Answered and managed incoming and outgoing calls while recording accurate messages. Greeted numerous visitors, including VIPs, vendors and interview candidates. Facilitated the changes to the student handbook each year. Implemented the staff and student ID program.

Processed and reconciled Accounts Payable. Processed and reconciled Accounts Receivable including deposits. Facilitated all Billing and Collections. Maintained integrity of general ledger, including the chart of accounts. Filed tax returns and prepared governmental reports in compliance with strict standards. Generated financial statements and facilitated account closing procedures each month. Analyzed and researched accounting issues to improve accounting operations procedures. Performed cost analysis as needed.

Accurately performed billing for three departments. Facilitated collections for all delinquent accounts. Set up new accounts including credit requests. Created account merge and billing process for IESI after they bought several small companies, facilitating a smooth merge of all companies. Performed complete payroll including payroll taxes. Managed the accounts payable and accounts receivable. Reconciliation of vendor statements.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in various accounting roles, including Accountant, Accounting Manager, and Administrative Assistant And Billing Specialist, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with General Ledger reconciliation, Accounts Payable, and Accounts Receivable reconciliation, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll processing and payroll taxes in multiple roles, suggesting strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed multiple budgets for grants, awards, and contracts, and created periodic reports comparing budgeted costs to actual costs, indicating strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Trained new employees on accounting principles and company procedures, and managed office supplies and vendors, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Generated financial statements and facilitated account closing procedures each month, and filed tax returns and prepared governmental reports, indicating strong proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Accounts Payable
skills.explanation: Processed and reconciled Accounts Payable in multiple roles, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Accounts Receivable
skills.explanation: Processed and reconciled Accounts Receivable, including deposits, and facilitated collections for all delinquent accounts, indicating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Cost Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed and researched accounting issues to improve accounting operations procedures, and performed cost analysis as needed, suggesting strong proficiency in cost analysis.

skills.name: Sage Software
skills.explanation: Used Sage software to process Accounts Payable, indicating strong proficiency in Sage software.
